page.title: 11Bridgnorth Leisure Centre
page.content: Bridgnorth Sports and Leisure Centre has a wide range of facilities for all age groups and abilities. It includes a large Sports Hall for Netball, Volley Ball, Five-a-side Football and Indoor-Tennis, Badminton and many other sports. There are also adjoining playing fields and tennis courts. There is a 25 metre Swimming Pool which is also indoors and this is used by schools mainly the Endowed School, during school hours and by the public during the evenings and at the week-end. Clubs and coaching are available for most sports. The Sports Centre was provided by various local authorities including Shropshire County Council, Bridgnorth District Council and Bridgnorth Town Council, all of whom contribute to the expensive running costs of the Centre, opened in 1976 by Princess Anne.
